attributes.action: Before invoking Article 50, there should be a free vote in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
A leading member of the Leave camp stated recently that a 52-48 per cent victory for the Remain campaign would leave 'unfinished business'.

We agree.
attributes.background: The result of the EU referendum was 52%-48% in favour of Leave.  For an issue of such enormity and irreversibility we don't believe this is a sufficient margin of victory.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
